title: Video: Halasan Bazar – Sometimes Happy, Sometimes Sad
content:
Our friends over at Crash Symbols have a Halasan Bazar release, Space Junk due out April 2.

The bitter sweet, 60’s inspired pop act are increasingly becoming a go-to of mine as we get closer to summer. The new video for ‘Sometimes happy, sometimes sad‘ is an appropriate if not expected visual interpretation of the track. Rapid fire textured visuals, with a surrealist escapade tale at the videos core; I can get on board.

Pitchfork also dropped a new track from the release yesterday, to which I’m struggling to find code. Bloody Pitchfork; listen to it here.
